Foxit PDF Reader
Fast, complete and lightweight viewer to interact with PDF documents

PDF documents are daily used around the world for important purposes. Data sharing through these files is pretty secure and reliable. However, if you donÃ‚Â´t have a PDF reader installed in your computer you will not be able to view and interact with this type of documents.

Foxit PDF Reader is a famous viewer specially designed for PDF documents. This efficient software includes new and enhanced features for a better performance and more facilities, besides of a complete kit of functions.

Its speed is one of the most outstanding features. As soon as you run the program it will launch almost instantly and save you a lot of time. There are PDF programs that annoy users by displaying splash windows with the company logo and multiple offers, but this PDF reader releases you from those headaches. Another great feature is the small and convenient size the program has, which compared to other heavy PDF readers only consumes low system resources.

Foxit PDF Reader allows you to interact with PDFs. Its excellent annotation tool enables you to annotate or comment on any PDF document. You can do it at the time of viewing and reading PDFs. WhatÃ‚Â´s more, it is possible to highlight text and draw graphics on PDF documents. Once you have typed text and included everything you wished in your PDF, the program lets you save it and print it. ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not all, thereÃ‚Â´s a built-in text converter you can use for converting any of your PDF documents into a simple text archive.

The new secure trust manager lets you deny or allow prohibited actions and transmission of data including JavaScript functions, URL connection and attachments PDF actions, that way attacks from viruses and malicious contents will be avoided.
